Name: Ambrose
description:
Ambrose is from Rwabigangura, Rukungiri district. He is a 54-year-old man, is married, and has 5 children.

He is a coffee farmer whose customers are coffee produce sellers and manufacturing industries of coffee drinks and sweets.

He is seeking a loan to improve his produce. He will buy farm inputs like manure and fertilizers to apply on the fields to get better product quality and boost sales.

Thank you, lenders.
